title: Research
text:
Trophic ecology of flowers and florivores



Polyomattus butterfly visits dry flower during severe drought in central Germany.




Honey bee foraging behavior



Honey bees crowd feeder during experiment. The rapid recruitment of foragers is enabled by waggle- dance-mediated recruitment.




Ecotoxicology



Toxic exposure in honey bee colonies is mediated by the social structure of the colony. From: Sponsler and Johnson (2017), Environmental Toxicology and Chemistry
